message.content:
Implement the following plan:

# Remove pcall guard from telescope fzf extension loading

## Context

The `pcall` around `telescope.load_extension("fzf")` was added as defense-in-depth, but the activation script now reliably builds `libfzf.so` on every `make switch`. The `pcall` silently swallows errors, which is worse ‚Äî we'd never notice if fzf broke again.

## Change

**File**: `home-manager/programs/neovim/lua/config/telescope.lua` (line 43)

Revert `pcall(telescope.load_extension, "fzf")` back to `telescope.load_extension("fzf")`.

## Verification

- `make neovim-test` passes
- `nvim` starts without errors


If you need specific details from before exiting plan mode (like exact code snippets, error messages, or content you generated), read the full transcript at: /Users/shunkakinoki/.REDACTED.jsonl

If this plan can be broken down into multiple independent tasks, consider using the TeamCreate tool to create a team and parallelize the work.

planContent:
# Remove pcall guard from telescope fzf extension loading

## Context

The `pcall` around `telescope.load_extension("fzf")` was added as defense-in-depth, but the activation script now reliably builds `libfzf.so` on every `make switch`. The `pcall` silently swallows errors, which is worse ‚Äî we'd never notice if fzf broke again.

## Change

**File**: `home-manager/programs/neovim/lua/config/telescope.lua` (line 43)

Revert `pcall(telescope.load_extension, "fzf")` back to `telescope.load_extension("fzf")`.

## Verification

- `make neovim-test` passes
- `nvim` starts without errors

content.text: Let me read the file first, then make the change.

content.content:
1‚Üí-- Fuzzy finder with extensible pickers for files, buffers, and more.
     2‚Üí-- From: https://github.com/nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim
     3‚Üílocal telescope = require("telescope")
     4‚Üí-- Theme helpers used by the dropdown/ivy pickers.
     5‚Üí-- From: https://github.com/nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim
     6‚Üílocal telescope_themes = require("telescope.themes")
     7‚Üítelescope.setup({
     8‚Üí	defaults = {
     9‚Üí		prompt_prefix = "   ",
    10‚Üí		selection_caret = " ‚ùØ ",
    11‚Üí		entry_prefix = "   ",
    12‚Üí		multi_icon = "+ ",
    13‚Üí		path_display = { "filename_first" },
    14‚Üí		vimgrep_arguments = {
    15‚Üí			"rg",
    16‚Üí			"--color=never",
    17‚Üí			"--no-heading",
    18‚Üí			"--with-filename",
    19‚Üí			"--line-number",
    20‚Üí			"--column",
    21‚Üí			"--smart-case",
    22‚Üí			"--sort=path",
    23‚Üí		},
    24‚Üí	},
    25‚Üí	pickers = {
    26‚Üí		find_files = {
    27‚Üí			theme = "ivy",
    28‚Üí		},
    29‚Üí	},
    30‚Üí	extensions = {
    31‚Üí		fzf = {
    32‚Üí			fuzzy = true,
    33‚Üí			override_generic_sorter = true,
    34‚Üí			override_file_sorter = true,
    35‚Üí			case_mode = "smart_case",
    36‚Üí		},
    37‚Üí		["ui-select"] = {
    38‚Üí			telescope_themes.get_dropdown(),
    39‚Üí		},
    40‚Üí	},
    41‚Üí})
    42‚Üítelescope.load_extension("gh")
    43‚Üípcall(telescope.load_extension, "fzf")
    44‚Üítelescope.load_extension("ui-select")
    45‚Üí
    46‚Üílocal function ivy(iopts)
    47‚Üí	return telescope_themes.get_ivy(iopts)
    48‚Üíend
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí-- Telescope builtin pickers used in the keymaps below.
    51‚Üí-- From: https://github.com/nvim-telescope/telescope.nvim
    52‚Üílocal builtin = require("telescope.builtin")
    53‚Üílocal keymap = vim.keymap.set
    54‚Üílocal opts = { noremap = true, silent = true }
    55‚Üí
    56‚Üí-- @keymap <C-p>: Find files (Telescope)
    57‚Üíkeymap("n", "<C-p>", function()
    58‚Üí	builtin.find_files(ivy({
    59‚Üí		find_command = {
    60‚Üí			"fd",
    61‚Üí			"--type",
    62‚Üí			"f",
    63‚Üí			"--strip-cwd-prefix",
    64‚Üí			"--hidden",
    65‚Üí		},
    66‚Üí	}))
    67‚Üíend, opts)
    68‚Üí
    69‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>of: Open old files (Telescope)
    70‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>of", function()
    71‚Üí	builtin.oldfiles(ivy({
    72‚Üí		only_cwd = true,
    73‚Üí	}))
    74‚Üíend, opts)
    75‚Üí
    76‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>lg: Live grep (Telescope)
    77‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>lg", function()
    78‚Üí	builtin.live_grep(ivy())
    79‚Üíend, opts)
    80‚Üí
    81‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>fb: Find buffers (Telescope)
    82‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>fb", function()
    83‚Üí	builtin.buffers(ivy())
    84‚Üíend, opts)
    85‚Üí
    86‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>fh: Find help tags (Telescope)
    87‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>fh", function()
    88‚Üí	builtin.help_tags(ivy())
    89‚Üíend, opts)
    90‚Üí
    91‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>fc: Find commands (Telescope)
    92‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>fc", function()
    93‚Üí	builtin.commands(ivy())
    94‚Üíend, opts)
    95‚Üí
    96‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>fr: Resume last Telescope search
    97‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>fr", function()
    98‚Üí	builtin.resume(ivy())
    99‚Üíend, opts)
   100‚Üí
   101‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>fq: Find in quickfix (Telescope)
   102‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>fq", function()
   103‚Üí	builtin.quickfix(ivy())
   104‚Üíend, opts)
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>/: Fuzzy find in current buffer (Telescope)
   107‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>/", function()
   108‚Üí	builtin.current_buffer_fuzzy_find(ivy())
   109‚Üíend, opts)
   110‚Üí
   111‚Üí-- @keymap <leader>ghi: Find GitHub issues (Telescope)
   112‚Üíkeymap("n", "<leader>ghi", function()
   113‚Üí	telescope.extensions.gh.issues(ivy())
   114‚Üíend, opts)
   115‚Üí
The file /Users/shunkakinoki/dotfiles/home-manager/programs/neovim/lua/config/telescope.lua has been updated successfully.
